content.rendered:
I love bagels, but never even thought about making a stuffed bagel out of the hole! Well thanks to Nick and Elyse Oleksak we didn’t have to!

Before appearing on Shark Tank they had sold about $200,000 worth of bagels out of their NYC retail store. Since making a deal with Lori Greiner their sales have gone over $20,000,000 and their products are sold at over 20,000 stores including 1,500 Starbucks locations, Delta Airlines and several hotel chains. 

In October 2018 Bantam Bagels announced they had been purchased by T. Marzetti Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of Lancaster Colony Corporation for $34M. 

If you haven’t tried Bantam Bagels yet you can order them direct from Amazon.

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Who doesn’t love a sponge with a smiley face? Apparently everyone does! After getting a deal on Shark Tank with Lori Greiner ($200,000 for 20%), Scrub Daddy has gone on to sell more than $170,000,000! I love using the Scrub Daddy at home.
